protocol_name: Single-cell mapping of lineage and identity via CellTagging
protocol_name_html: Single-cell mapping of lineage and identity via CellTagging
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"7vmf1","text":"Single-cell technologies are offering unprecedented insight into complex biology, revealing the behavior of rare cell populations that are typically masked in bulk population analyses. One current limitation of single-cell approaches is that lineage relationships are lost as a result of cell processing, restricting interpretations of the data collected. Elegant computational approaches have been developed in an effort to infer these missing observations, but it remains a challenge to reconstruct true reprogramming trajectories using these tools. Although sophisticated lineage tracing solutions to connect cell history with fate are emerging, these protocols are either not compatible with high-throughput scRNA-seq, or require genome editing strategies that are not readily deployed in some systems. Here, our protocol describes a single-cell resolution clonal tracking approach, ‘CellTagging’, based on combinatorial cell indexing, permitting the parallel capture of lineage information and cell identity. CellTagging integrates with high-throughput single-cell RNA-sequencing, where iterative rounds of cell labeling enable the construction of multi-level lineage trees. This straightforward lentiviral-labeling approach can be applied to an array of cell biological applications to simultaneously profile lineage and identity, at single-cell resolution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"b52es","text":"For generation of lentivirus, the appropiate institutional regualations must be satisfied.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: cell barcoding, lineage tracing, single-cell analysis, direct lineage reprogramming
authors: Samantha Morris,Brent A. Biddy,Wenjun Kong,Kenji Kamimoto,Chuner Guo,Sarah Waye,Tao Sun
status_info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"f8a2b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eorib","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2pc8u","text":"Thaw Stellar Competent Cells in an ice bath just before use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"E27D93B0DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","id":679017,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Amplification of CellTag library"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9fo18","text":"After thawing, mix 100 uL of cells with 10-50 ng of CellTag V1 DNA in a 1.5-mL microcentrifuge tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"E2900A40DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","id":679018,"previous_id":679017,"previous_guid":"E27D93B0DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","section":"Amplification of CellTag library"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fm0oe","text":"Place transformation mixture on ice for 30 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"E2900A41DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","id":679019,"previous_id":679018,"previous_guid":"E2900A40DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","section":"Amplification of CellTag library"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"557cf","text":"Heat shock the cells for exactly 60 seconds at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":47,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"es0r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"5ADEAF60DECF11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","temperature":"42","unit":10,"label":"","step_guid":"E2900A42DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593"}}],"guid":"E2900A42DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","id":679020,"previous_id":679019,"previous_guid":"E2900A41DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","section":"Amplification of CellTag library"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"66dbd","text":"Place tube on ice for 1-2 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"E2903150DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","id":679021,"previous_id":679020,"previous_guid":"E2900A42DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","section":"Amplification of CellTag library"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a5tho","text":"Add SOC medium to bring the final volume to 1000 uL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"E2903151DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","id":679022,"previous_id":679021,"previous_guid":"E2903150DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","section":"Amplification of CellTag library"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4vg05","text":"Incubate by shaking (~250 rpm) for 1 hour at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":45,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"d15jo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"6F214CD0DECF11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","temperature":"37","unit":10,"label":"","step_guid":"E2905860DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593"}}],"guid":"E2905860DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","id":679023,"previous_id":679022,"previous_guid":"E2903151DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","section":"Amplification of CellTag library"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"48o0l","text":"Take 6 uL of the recovery. Use 1 uL of this to prepare a 1:10 and then a 1:100 dilution. Plate both dilutions and the rest of the 5 uL of recovery onto three separate LB\/Amp plates. Grow overnight at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":200,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"d2ued","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"FF12D160DECF11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","temperature":"37","unit":10,"label":"","step_guid":"E2905861DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593"}}],"guid":"E2905861DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","id":679024,"previous_id":679023,"previous_guid":"E2905860DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","section":"Amplification of CellTag library"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"56h0l","text":"Add the rest of the recovery to 500 mL of LB+Amp. Grow overnight while shaking (~250 rpm) at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":93,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"4pbq7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"0479DFE0DED011E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","temperature":"37","unit":10,"label":"","step_guid":"E2907F70DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593"}}],"guid":"E2907F70DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","id":679025,"previous_id":679024,"previous_guid":"E2905861DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","section":"Amplification of CellTag library"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bc9ot","text":"After counting the CFUs from the LB\/Amp plates the next day, calculate the transformation efficiency.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"E30ADF90DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","id":679026,"previous_id":679025,"previous_guid":"E2907F70DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","section":"Amplification of CellTag library"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"avlsb","text":"Harvest the cells from the liquid culture and use multiple Maxiprep columns (Sigma or Zymogen) to purify the library.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"E3203C50DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","id":679027,"previous_id":679026,"previous_guid":"E30ADF90DECE11E8BB6C6950CCAC8593","section":"Amplification of CellTag library"}
